question: 1a. Date of status change, month
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 1b. Date of status change, day
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 1c. Date of status change, year
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2a. UDS data collection status changed; participant’s new status is:
response_labels: 1, Annual UDS follow-up by telephone | 2, Minimal contact | 3, Annual in-person UDS follow-up
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2a1. Autopsy consent on file?
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in-person follow-up), Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes),  or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b1. Participant is too cognitively impaired
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b2. Participant is too ill or physically impaired
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b3. Participant refuses neuropsychological testing or clinical exam
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b4. Participant or coparticipant unreachable, not available, or moved away
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b5. Participant has permanently entered nursing home
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b5a. Date permanently moved to nursing home, month
branching_logic: Blank if Blank if Question 2b5 RENURSE ne 1 (Yes) or Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b5b. Date permanently moved to nursing home, day
branching_logic: Blank if Blank if Question 2b5 RENURSE ne 1 (Yes) or Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b5c. Date permanently moved to nursing home, year
branching_logic: Blank if Blank if Question 2b5 RENURSE ne 1 (Yes) or Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 2b6. Participant is rejoining ADRC
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 3. Participant will no longer receive FTLD Module follow-up, but annual in-person UDS visits will continue
branching_logic: Blank if Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes) or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 3a. FTLD discontinued reason
response_labels: 1, ADRC decision | 2 = Participant/co-articipant refused | 3 = Informant not available | 4 = Other, specify below
branching_logic: Blank if Question 3 FTLDDISC ne 1 (Discontinue FTLD), Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes), or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 3b. Specify other FTLD discontinued reason
branching_logic: Blank if Question 3a FTLDREAS ne 4 (Other), Question 4a DECEASED = 1 (Yes), or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 4a. Participant has died
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4b DISCONT = 1 (Yes)

question: 4b. Participant has been dropped from ADRC
5a1. Date of death, month
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4a DECEASED ne 1 (Yes)

question: 5a2. Date of death, day
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4a DECEASED ne 1 (Yes)

question: 5a3. Date of death, year
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4a DECEASED ne 1 (Yes)

question: 5b. ADRC autopsy
response_labels: 0, No ADRC autopsy expected | 1, An ADRC autopsy has been done; data submitted or pending
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4a DECEASED ne 1 (Yes)

question: 6a1. Date dropped from ADRC, month
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4b DISCONT ne 1 (Yes)

question: 6a2. Date dropped from ADRC, day
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4b DISCONT ne 1 (Yes)

question: 6a3. Date dropped from ADRC, year
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4b DISCONT ne 1 (Yes)

question: 6b. Primary reason participant discontinued ADRC participation
response_labels: 1, ADRC decision or protocol | 2, Participant or coparticipant asked to be dropped
branching_logic: Blank if Question 2a PROTOCOL = 1 (Follow-up by telephone), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 2 (Minimal contact), Question 2a PROTOCOL = 3 (Annual in person follow-up), Question 3 FTLDDISC = 1 (Discontinue FTLD), or Question 4b DISCONT ne 1 (Yes)
